mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(EMAIL, ORDERS_ID, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_WRITER, SCORE, REVIEW_FILE_NAME, REVIEW_STORED_FILE_NAME) SELECT M.EMAIL, #{orders_id}, #{review_content}, M.NAME, #{score}, #{review_file_name}, #{review_stored_file_name} FROM MEMBER M, ORDERS O WHERE M.EMAIL = #{email} AND ORDERS_ID = #{orders_id} AND O.ORDERS_STATUS = 3
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERS O ON R.ORDERS_ID = O.ORDERS_ID JOIN CART C ON O.CART_ID = C.CART_ID WHERE C.PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_CONTENT = #{review_content}, REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE = #{review_update_date}, SCORE = #{score}, REVIEW_FILE_NAME = #{review_file_name}, REVIEW_STORED_FILE_NAME = #{review_stored_file_name} WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{review_id}
